explains: adj. [自] 模拟的；有长短针的
wordGroup: analog circuit 模拟电路；类比电路
analog to digital 模拟到数字转换
analog input 模拟输入；相似输入
analog output 模拟输出；类比输出；相似输出
analog simulation 模拟仿真；类比模拟
analog clock 模拟时钟；指针式类比时钟
analog quantity 模拟量；相似量；类比量

sentences.en: In a world of precision-engineered digital cameras, the colorfully analog Blackbird fly is a strange bird—one that took almost 15 years to hatch.
sentences.cn: 在这样一个高精密度数码相机的世界，像黑鸟飞这样的彩色模拟相机属特异的一种，因为它花费15年的时间投入飞行拍摄。

sentences.en: As proud as I am that my son is tech-savvy like his daddy, it's equally important to me that he have analog skills: the ability to bait a hook, clean a gutter.
sentences.cn: 我的儿子和他的爸爸一样精通技术，这让我很自豪，但对我来说同样重要的是，他也有会通过模仿学习技能：能够给鱼钩上钩、清理排水沟。

sentences.en: An analog signal is composed of four basic components: DC and AC magnitudes, frequency, and phase.
sentences.cn: 模拟信号由直流和交流分量、频率和相位四部分组成。
